ai-patthana13.22:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma they resplendently:
ai-patthana13.22:1.1_0: Not being visible and not insisting on teaching, this is a condition for the sake of impingement.
ai-patthana13.22:1.1_1: Not being visible in this way, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana13.22:1.1_2: Not being visible and not insisting on teaching, this doesn’t give rise to the repulsion.
ai-patthana13.22:1.1_3: Such things don’t give rise to the repulsion of the teaching, and don’t give rise to the flood by repulsion.
ai-patthana13.22:1.1_4: Such things don’t give rise to the repulsion of the teaching, and don’t give rise to the flood by repulsion.
ai-patthana13.22:1.1_5: Such things don’t give rise to the repulsion of the teaching, and don’t give rise to the flood by repulsion.
ai-patthana13.22:2.1_0: Not being visible and not insisting on teaching, this is a condition for the sake of grasping. ...
ai-patthana13.22:3.1_0: Not being visible and without impingement. That teaching is conditioned by not grasping.
ai-patthana13.22:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana13.22:4.1_0: ... and the object of three objects,
ai-patthana13.22:4.1_4: (They should be expanded as in the sections.)
ai-patthana13.22:5.1_0: Not being visible in this way, not for the sake of non-existence, nor for the sake of having no concern for the teaching.
ai-patthana13.22:5.1_1: Not being visible in this way, not for the sake of non-existence, nor for the sake of making amends.
ai-patthana13.22:5.1_2: Not being visible in this way, not for the sake of non-existence, nor for the sake of embodiment.
ai-patthana13.22:5.1_3: It is the cause, not the reason for the attainment of the impingement, not for the sake of non-result, and for the sake of non-disappearance condition.
ai-patthana13.22:5.1_4: It is the condition for the unshakable, not for the purpose of attraction, repulsion, views, doubt, and conceit.
ai-patthana13.22:5.1_5: It is the cause, not the reason for the attainment of the impingement, but for the sake of non-existence, and for the sake of non-obsence, and for the sake of repulsion, and for the sake of (of the teaching).
ai-patthana13.22:6.1_0: for the sake of resenting, not for the resenting, not for the lawfulness of the Dhamma, is a condition for the penetration of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana13.22:6.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana13.22:7.1_1: Sharing the eighteen faculties and eighteen faculties, and the nine sections produced in the nine faculties, the sixth part in the produced in the nine faculties, and the eighteen faculties.
